data.communities: Lived on CPAN briefly as Tie::Log.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I choose the this namespace, because it is a tied interface to a
    log file. I was tempted to throw simple in there somewhere, but it
    didn't seem needed. As far as I know, there aren't any tied
    interfaces like this for basic logging. At least, none on CPAN that
    I could find.
